trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref> event, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref>事件， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"> </xref>事件，和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartCancelEventArgs class contains information for several different Web Parts events that can be canceled.
trans-unit.target: WebPartCancelEventArgs 类包含为可取消的几个不同的 Web 部件事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: These events include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> events.
The WebPartCancelEventArgs class provides access to the Web Parts control involved in the event.
trans-unit.target: WebPartCancelEventArgs 类提供对事件中涉及的 Web 部件控件的访问。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs.WebPart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问 Web 部件控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs.WebPart%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs.WebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or server or user control) involved in the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> （或服务器或用户控件） 事件中涉及。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web Parts control involved in the cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: 获取可取消事件中涉及的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> involved in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> involved in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event.
